banner.title: TP WorkLife 10/12
banner.mainContentHeadline: The podcast where science meets business
banner.mainContent: From fixing meetings to finding a mentor, get new insights to help you enjoy your time at work and thrive in your career.

videoData.title: Don't shy away from ignorance -- use it to better yourself
videoData.socialTitle: Don't shy away from ignorance -- use it to better yourself

nodes.whoTheyAre: BCG's Laura Fox joined as a consultant in 2015. Previously, she spent five years in Qatar, Bangladesh and the US, in marketing, branding and digital strategy roles in consumer finance, museum, government and the NGO sectors. Fox earned her MBA in global strategy from NYU Stern, where she received the school’s Service Award for leadership and the Business & Society Program’s international post-MBA fellowship to China.

videoData.description: Not everyone is comfortable with ignorance, but in this lively talk Laura Fox explains why we should all become comfortable with the words, "I don't know." For one thing, admitting what you don't know frees you to transform inexperience into growth -- both personally and intellectually.
videoData.socialDescription: Not everyone is comfortable with ignorance, but in this lively talk Laura Fox explains why we should all become comfortable with the words, "I don't know." For one thing, admitting what you don't know frees you to transform inexperience into growth -- both personally and intellectually.
